s_synopsis: The most popular American football game, "Tecmo Bowl" pits the player vs. the computer in 11 game single-elimination playoff action, or you can go head-to-head with a human opponent in action or coach mode. There are 12 teams of real NFL players (circa 1988) to choose from, but don't look for official NFL team logos or mascots like Bears or Dolphins, Tecmo Bowl has the NFLPA but not the NFL license.
